title: Coronavirus: Singapore quarantines 20,000 migrant workers
description: The workers will be paid - but some have complained of overcrowded and dirty conditions.
content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 Migrant workers in Singapore's central business district in February
Singapore has told 20,000 foreign workers to stay in their dormitories for 14 days as coronavirus cases increase in the city state.
